items.title: Slide 1
items.description: Every great achievement begins with the decision to try. Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

items.title: Slide 2
items.description: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Don't let small minds convince you that your dreams are too big.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all. Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature.

items.title: Slide 3
items.description: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. Be the change you wish to see in the world.

items.title: Slide 4
items.description: Adventure is worthwhile in itself. The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.

items.title: slide 5
items.description: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will. The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

items.title: Slide 6
items.description: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page. Travel far enough, you meet yourself.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

items.title: Slide 7
items.description: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them. The future depends on what you do today.
